alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Georgetown County through 645 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Santee, or 11 miles southwest of Georgetown, moving east at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar and Satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning strikes could temporarily knock out power. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, North Santee and Lambert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
